effect.short: Heals the target for ½ its max HP, or ⅔ on Grassy Terrain.
effect.full: Heals the target for ½ its max HP.  If grassy terrain is in effect, heals for ⅔ instead.

flavorTexts.text:
The user restores the target’s HP by up to half of its
max HP. It restores more HP when the terrain
is grass.
